get.description: Retrieve a list of all roles. Only accessible to users with Admin or Editor roles.

post.description: Assign roles to a user. Only accessible to Admins.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User ID to whom roles will be assigned

roles.description: Array of role IDs to assign

400.description: User already has the selected role

message.example: The user already has the selected role: ADMIN
An error occurred while assigning roles.

delete.description: Remove roles from a user. Only accessible to Admins.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: User ID from whom roles will be removed

roles.description: Array of role IDs to remove

message.example: An error occurred while deleting roles.

get.description: Show Users Only visible to users with the Admin or Editor roles.
Get details of a specific user. Only visible to users with the Admin or Editor roles.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to retrieve

delete.description: Delete a specific user. Only accessible to users with Admin or Editor roles.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to delete

message.example: An error occurred. Please try again later.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token. (But if the user is login, his redirect to travels)

message.example: Login failed. Please try again later.

post.description: This endpoint logs out the authenticated user by revoking all issued tokens.

204.description: Tokens successfully revoked. No content returned.

500.description: Unable to revoke tokens. Please try again later.

message.example: Unable to revoke tokens. Please try again later.

post.description: Registers a new user and returns a token on success.

201.description: User registered successfully, returns a token

example: The email has already been taken.

500.description: Registration failed. Please try again later.

message.example: Registration failed. Please try again later.

post.summary: Add a new comment to a tour
post.description: Stores a comment for a specific tour that belongs to a travel, with optional image attachments.

message.example: Comment added, stay tuned for updates

404.description: Tour does not belong to the specified travel

items.example: The image must be a file of type: jpg, jpeg, png

message.example: An error occurred. Please try again later.

example: The sort by field must be one of price, start_date, end_date
The sort order field must be one of asc, desc

get.description: Shows all comments of the resource. Only visible to users with the Admin or Editor roles.

text.example: Deserunt ut explicabo quis expedita. Dolorem fuga accusamus qui nemo minima. Rem et nam blanditiis commodi ex

is_public.description: Shows the public status of the resource. Only visible to users with the Admin or Editor roles.

get.description: Shows the public status of the resource. Only visible to users with the Admin or Editor roles.

description.example: Vel vel minima sunt earum. Temporibus sint voluptas aliquam dolor aut voluptatem delectus.

is_public.description: Shows the public status of the resource. Only visible to users with the Admin or Editor roles.
